features: PROTECTION FROM IRRITATION– Our pubic razor is designed with 3 skin-protection blades that have unique skin guards to prevent razor bumps and ingrown hairs, ensuring a smooth and comfortable close shave.
ULTRA-GLIDE SERUM FOR ADVANCED HYDRATION – Give your skin the comfort it needs with ultra-glide serum + aloe for advanced lubricating protection.
SLIM CARTRIDGE IDEAL FOR PUBIC AREA – Easy to use and designed with a slim, pivoting cartridge, it flexes around your curves to get those hard-to-reach areas for pubic hair removal.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED – A hypoallergenic formula that’s dermatologist and gynecologist tested.
GET EXPERT-LEVEL PRECISION AND CONTROL – The curved, textured handle is designed for secure grip.
FITS ANY SCHICK – Razor handle fits any Hydro Silk refills.
body.description: Designed to prevent pubic irritation and ingrown hairs, Hydro Silk Ultimate Pubic Skin Protection Razor offers 3 skin protection blades with unique skin guards plus a slim pivoting cartridge that flexes around your curves to reach tricky areas. Dermatologist and gynecologist tested, this pubic hair razor is designed with a curved, textured handle for a secure grip. Get expert-level precision and control at home with this bikini razor. It gives your skin a boost with our hypoallergenic ultra-glide serum + aloe for advanced lubricating protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I hate women's razors
reviews.reviewText: I always use men's razors, because all the women's razors I have tried just don't cut it. This is by far the best women's razor I have ever tried.I switched it back and forth with my mens razor while I was shaving my legs so I could compare them. The men's razor I use was only slightly better than the women's and I think it was due to it having 5 blades instead of 3.This razor was more comfortable to hold and more flexible around curves. It handled my ankles and knees far better than then the man's.I will probably end up keeping both on hand. The men's for the days I haven't shaved in weeks (winter month's) and the women's for when I keep up on shaving regularly.Another plus is the refill for this razor is a couple dollars cheaper than the men's.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This razor works well. It is easy to use, and fits comfortably in your hand. It comes with the razor handle and 3 cartridges. I like how it is nice and gentle on the skin, and doesn't leave bumps or cuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and silky
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this razor on my bikini area and on my underarms- two spots that are generally more sensitive than others. It's so easy to use, I can do it quickly without worrying about nicking myself, and the results are smooth and silky. The razor is also comfortable to hold.I never really thought to have one razor for my legs and one for more sensitive areas, but now I love the idea and will definitely be buying more cartridges for this handle when I'm out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bikini area.
reviews.reviewText: This razor is good for the bikini area as advertised, but not so great for anywhere else. I didn’t think it would make a difference but it does. The blade is thinner for the hard to reach spots around the bikini area so it works perfectly for what it was designed for. Just don’t plan on using it for both legs and bikini line

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This provided a close and comfortable shave. There was no uncomfortable irritation afterward. I believe it's about as good as a razor can get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Simple and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The razor is a simple design and easy to use. It gives a clean smooth shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thinner blades - better for private parts
reviews.reviewText: These thinner blades seems to shave better on the private parts with less risk of cutting myself. Also the cartridge plastic part is skinnier compared to other ones I’ve tried.Love the cute pink handle.. very lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use razor, and gentle on the skin. Good value pack!
